title: Essential Oil Roll-On: Immune Boost - Servello Skincare
author: Name
description: Immune Boost Essential Oil Roll-On: Our Immune Boost Essential Oil Blend is a ready to use roller bottle. This blend is prediluted with organic jojoba oil, to a strong & safe dilution rate. Herbal, menthol, spicy tones with a hint of citrus. Support your immune system wherever you are! Apply the Immune Strength Roll-On to the neck, wrists, or inside of your elbows.Do not apply to face.
